nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome to SecureLife Insurance! How can I assist you today?

nodes.label: ask_policy_type
utterances: What type of insurance policy are you interested in?

nodes.label: health_insurance_options
utterances: We offer comprehensive and basic health insurance plans. Which one are you interested in?

nodes.label: car_insurance_options
utterances: We have full coverage and liability-only car insurance. Which do you prefer?

nodes.label: comprehensive_health
utterances: Our comprehensive health plan covers a wide range of services. Would you like to proceed with this?

nodes.label: basic_health
utterances: Our basic health plan covers essential services. Would you like to proceed with this?

nodes.label: full_coverage_car
utterances: Our full coverage car insurance offers extensive protection. Would you like to proceed with this?

nodes.label: liability_only_car
utterances: Our liability-only car insurance covers third-party damages. Would you like to proceed with this?

nodes.label: confirmation
utterances: Great choice! Your policy is being processed. Would you like to explore other options?

messages.text: Welcome to SecureLife Insurance! How can I assist you today?
I'm interested in buying an insurance policy
What type of insurance policy are you interested in?
I need car insurance
We have full coverage and liability-only car insurance. Which do you prefer?
I need liability only
Our liability-only car insurance covers third-party damages. Would you like to proceed with this?
Yes, that's what I need
Great choice! Your policy is being processed. Would you like to explore other options?
I want to explore other options
